title: Nri Kryne
description: Meet Vijeren, a typical 12-year-old boy...with fangs! And did I mention he lives in the shadow of a powerful demon? When a frightening fire burns down his home, Vijeren is free! But now he's on the run in a world of blood-suckers and brain-eaters. And hot on his heels is the demon who craves his soul. If Vijeren can't find a way to defeat the demon, the monster will melt the flesh from his bones. Nri Kryne is the thrilling first book in the young adult Monsters and Demons fantasy series. If you love spine-tingling adventure, non-stop action, and blood-thirsty monsters, then you'll adore Mara Duryea's awesome book! Buy Nri Kryne today and leave Earth for planet Ilo! Nri Kryne was originally published as Pariahs, first book in the Ilings series under the name Julia Benally
author: Mara Duryea
